characters.name: Yuji Itadori
characters.description: The main protagonist of Jujutsu Kaisen. A high school student who becomes the host of Sukuna, the King of Curses, after swallowing one of his fingers. Yuji is known for his physical strength and determination to save people.
abilities: Ability to use cursed energy techniques
characters.domainExpansion: Yuji does not have his own domain expansion, but can use Sukuna's when he takes control.

characters.name: Megumi Fushiguro
characters.description: A first-year student at Tokyo Metropolitan Magic Technical College. Megumi is one of the main characters and a friend of Yuji. He is known for his ability to summon shadows and his potential as a sorcerer.
characters.domainExpansion: Chains of the Cursed Womb

characters.name: Satoru Gojo
characters.description: A special grade sorcerer and teacher of Yuji and Megumi. Gojo is known as the strongest sorcerer and is extremely powerful. He has an eccentric personality and is highly respected in the world of sorcery.
characters.domainExpansion: Unlimited Void

characters.name: Nobara Kugisaki
characters.description: A first-year student at Tokyo Metropolitan Magic Technical College. Nobara is a sorceress who uses a hammer and nails imbued with cursed energy. She is known for her energetic personality and combat skills.
abilities: Use of cursed hammer and nails
characters.domainExpansion: Nobara does not have a known domain expansion.

characters.name: Todo Aoi
characters.description: A second-year student at Kyoto Metropolitan Magic Technical College. Todo is known for his powerful swordsmanship and his ability to use cursed energy techniques.
characters.domainExpansion: Boogie Woogie

characters.name: Atsuya Kusakabe
characters.description: A second-year student at Kyoto Metropolitan Magic Technical College. Atsuya is known for his ability to manipulate water and his calm demeanor.
characters.domainExpansion: Atsuya does not have a known domain expansion.

curses.name: Sukuna
curses.description: The King of Curses, who resides within Yuji Itadori. Sukuna is extremely powerful and dangerous, known for his ability to manipulate cursed energy and his desire to destroy humanity.

curses.name: Mahito
curses.description: A special grade curse that can manipulate human souls. Mahito is one of the main antagonists and is known for his ability to transform humans into curses.

curses.name: Jogo
curses.description: A special grade curse that can control fire and lava. Jogo is one of the antagonists and is known for his ability to create fire domains and his desire to destroy humanity.

curses.name: Hanami
curses.description: A special grade curse that can control plants and nature. Hanami is one of the antagonists and is known for his ability to manipulate the natural environment and his desire to protect nature.

curses.name: Choso
curses.description: A special grade curse that can manipulate blood. Choso is one of the antagonists and is known for his ability to control blood and his desire to fight strong opponents.

curses.name: Dagon
curses.description: A special grade curse that can manipulate water. Dagon is one of the antagonists and is known for his ability to control water and his desire to fight strong opponents.
curses.domainExpansion: Dagon does not have a known domain expansion.

curses.domainExpansion: Esou does not have a known domain expansion.
